title: Sparkling Dream
alternative_title: Dreams of the Flame Blossoms Fire Flower Night ; 화화몽
status: Dreams of the Flame Blossoms Fire Flower Night ; 화화몽
description:
Description :
        The seventh life, finally bloody revenge! Ryu Hee-gyeom, who helped the shaman in trouble, receives five lives. He dies in vain in all five lives, and Ryu Hee-gyeom comes back to life again. In his repeated life, he only wants revenge for the traitor, and due to some variable, he returns to the seventh. His life flows differently from his memory. “Since I got married, whether I kill or live, the queen is now my person.” Somehow, she becomes the only queen of the king and starts to be favored... “If you try to escape, cut off your leg.
